metadata.subject: Re: Fw: New York Post Morning Digest - July 1, 2016

relationships.description: News article mentions pizzeria was once at center of Mafia extortion plot

analysis.purpose: Forwarding and commenting on New York Post news digest, specifically celebrating the murder of Louis Barbati
analysis.significance: Shows casual discussion of violent crime and apparent satisfaction with a mob-related murder

notable_quotes: Ha! That fuckin lou barbati, its about time someone nailed him over those nuts
too many nuts in the spumoni
red_flags: Celebratory tone about a violent murder

blackmail_indicators.description: No evidence of blackmail or coercion - this is commentary on a news article about a murder

illegal_activity.description: Document is sharing and commenting on New York Post news articles about third-party criminal activities, not evidence of first-hand illegal activity by the email participants

details: Full New York Post Morning Digest with multiple news stories
Reference to top story about Louis Barbati murder

public_knowledge.context: This is a forwarded news digest from the New York Post containing publicly published news stories

analysis.summary: Email chain forwarding a New York Post news digest with commentary celebrating the murder of Louis Barbati, co-owner of L&B Spumoni Gardens, who was killed in what appears to be a mob-related hit job outside his Brooklyn home.
